Canvas - Class in mbedApp.room
Canvas is a class to allow for simple graphical drawing on a canvas.

checkTempChange() - Method in class mbedApp.mbed.Temperature
Every time the temperature changes check it, if it's below the minimum, send the temperature to the room and the new temp that should be set by the thermostat.
checkTempPot() - Method in class mbedApp.mbed.Temperature
Every time a potentiometer changes send the value using the Messaging Client
